question:
You have seen an advertisement in an Australian magazine for someone to live with a family for six months and look after their six year old child. 
Write a letter to the parents. In your letter,
Explain why you would like the job
Give details of why you would be a suitable person to employ.
Say how you would spend your free time while you are in Australia.
Write at lease 150 words.
text: I am writing in connection with an advertisement that I have seen in an Australian magazine. The description of the job describes that I have to live with a family for six months and need to take care of their six-month-old baby.

I would like to apply for the given job as I find it convenient for me, especially at this age as I can not stand for long hours. Besides, at the same time, it will help me to earn a decent amount of money as well.

I think that I would be a suitable candidate to employ as previously I used to work at a nursing home for children. Hence, I am just not aware of what diet should be given to the child but also know how to handle the situation in  case of emergency.
In my leisure time, I would like to explore Australia as it is known as a scenic country with many adventurous places such as beaches and hill stations.
Please feel free to contact me if you need more details. I really hope that you would consider me for the offered job in view of my past experience.
